docs.lead_paragraph: In an interview, Smoltz discussed the tournament, Tommy John surgery and what he would have been if he hadn’t been a pitcher.

docs.lead_paragraph: Austria was among the first countries in Europe to put out the welcome mat when waves of people fleeing war and poverty reached the continent. Now, its focus is showing them the door.

headline.print_headline: Europe's Trend: Austria, Once Open, Now Shows Migrants Door
headline.main: Europe's Trend: Austria, Once Open, Now Shows Migrants Door

docs.snippet: Austria was among the first countries in Europe to put out the welcome mat when waves of people fleeing war and poverty reached the continent. Now, its focus is showing them the door....

docs.lead_paragraph: State Department officials will come to Minnesota on Tuesday to hold the only public meeting on a draft environmental review for the final segment of Enbridge Energy's project to boost the capacity of its Alberta Clipper pipeline.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Levinson, a former F.B.I. agent, vanished in Iran in March 2007. Candidate Trump promised to bring him home. The Iranians have denied involvement.

headline.main: Trump Under Pressure to Resolve the Disappearance of Robert Levinson

byline.original: By BARRY MEIER and ADAM GOLDMAN

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's Alex Harvey surged past Norway's Martin Johnsrud Sundby going into the final bend to score a stunning victory in the men's 50km mass start, the final race of the Nordic World Ski Championships on Sunday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A blistering start allowed Dean Burmester to surge away from the field at the start of the final round before surviving a late wobble to secure his maiden European Tour title when he won the Tshwane Open by three shots on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Burmester Wins Maiden Title After Blowing Away Field
headline.main: Burmester Wins Maiden Title After Blowing Away Field
